reviews.review:
初见天空之城，给我的是惊叹。
初见伊丽莎白，我被她的舞姿深深吸引

我一直在回到那个屋子，时间不断的重复，只是这二十年来，我一直呆在了屋子里，我一直在忏悔，天空之城，伊丽莎白都不过是一场梦。 

刚玩完一周目，时间线还没有里过来，见谅。
Amazing game, I played the main game in 2 days.
It's just a classic
This game hates MSI Afterburner or any other overclocking softwares lol. Nonetheless, game is well done. Might consider as a Masterpiece.
Игра очень понравилась, интересный сюжет
m enamore de elisa xD
Engrossing game-play, great visuals, stylized presentation and a storyline that I'll need to see where it take me.... highly recommended.
fantastic game <3
yyds!
真正意义上我心目中的第九艺术！史诗级别的3A大作游戏体验，任何游戏都无法撼动。

Lo disfruté hasta cierto punto. El combate y los enemigos son muy diferentes a los de las dos entregas originales y el cambio de Rapture a Columbia fue un salto muy grande. 
El final es muy abrupto y carece de peso, en mi opinión. Ni la expansión Burrial at Sea salva a este título.
uma história surreal!! além de todo um universo fantasia e único, ainda trás ainda um pve muito bom e desafiador! muito zika!!
我看上了我女儿，我是傻逼

Ralmente un muy buen juego. Como shooter es entretenido, aunque nada especial. El hecho de poder hacer ciertas combinaciones con los vigorizantes es lo que realmente le da su toque al juego. Punto aparte para la historia y el desarrollo de los personajes, todo lo cual está muy bien hecho. El final tiene un plot twist del porte de una casa y parece sacado de Evangelion xD

剧情挺深的 不看下解说很难弄明白
就是血腥程度配这画风太突兀了 不太能接受
总体不错

Muito Bom, com historia de filme.
Amazing, I loved every second of it. While it didnt necessarily feel like a bioshock game in the sense that it wasnt similar to its predecessors, it was an amazing experience, and I loved it
Great graphics and characters. Story is solid. Game play very good.

Now I have to wait a few years for the next bioshock game to come out. I dont know if i can wait that long. I love these games. I really love the spooky and more scary first 2 but I love the third the most since I enjoy the company of another person with me .
Different from the first 2 games, but still just as amazing.
蒸汽朋克，天空之城，反乌托邦，以后出现类蒸汽题材的游戏都不会超过《无限》。

Элизабет как живая...атмосфера бомба! в общем классные Все 3 части Биошока с логичным и сильным завершением истории.Советую.
Гуд.
经典永流传 我爱伊丽莎白 always n 4ever

Uma obra prima. Com certeza entra na lista dos melhores jogos que já joguei junto com o primeiro Bioshock Vale cada centavo. A história, os gráficos e a gameplay são incríveis, em especial a história que é profunda e um tanto complexa se você parar para analisar o jogo. A DLC não preciso nem dizer nada, fecha com chave de ouro. Recomendo jogar o primeiro Bioshock antes deste.
好
玩个球，老是死机，明明配置没问题的，突然就没声音，然后就是卡机，只能重启。。。难受啊
我爱伊丽莎白

为了玩到这个游戏
我已经花了三天时间
研究了所有可以在网上查到的手段
可惜这个游戏它就是一直停止运行啊

使用过的手段包括但不限于：
1.联通热点下载
2.英文版游戏
3.验证游戏完整性
4.挂加速器并使用steam外国节点下载
5.使用本地文件中自带的2个修复文件修复
6.重新安装n次
7.修改win7兼容性
8.点开始游戏选择第二个运行，输入两次1
...

直到
我换了台电脑，终于可以进游戏了
这游戏就是这么迷，如果你遇到和我一样的问题
别再难为自己找什么解决方法了
要么换台电脑，要么直接去玩免安装版
以上
как бы вроде норм но такое себе класно ну да крч
Za mne se jedná o nejlepší BioShock jak po příběhové, tak i po gameplayové stránce

評価が高かったのでセールで購入
結論から言うと微妙。映画としてみたら面白いのかなぁ。

I have rarely felt so many feels. And also it's been a while since I've experiences so many (good) plot twists in a piece of entertainment. I miss the views and walking around Columbia already (though obviously I definitely do not miss certain aspects of the city.....)

Don't let the fact that it is a shooter scare you away from this game: I absolutely suck at shooters (and dislike them in general), but the gameplay is a lot of fun and not super hard.

The game is graphically and atmospherically STUNNING and even my potato-PC can run it. In fact, it was struggling with Bioshock 1 and 2 way more than it was with this one. You don't have to have played the previous two installments to enjoy this one.

Trigger warnings (not spoiler free): [spoiler] some graphic violence and disturbing medical settings like operating rooms and racism [/spoiler]
In this BIOSHOCK is very interesting story but what i liked more was this waves, you can check on my vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nfYCgyEQic
Jest to zdecydowanie wspaniała i w miarę oryginalna historia szkoda jedynie że po jakimś czasie rozgrywka staje się monotonny
its a pretty fun bioshock game all tho it is the easiest bioshock to me

Historia ridiculamente boa, combate daora, dando mt o que fazer em pouco tempo precisando de muita precisao, mas as vezes muito facil, senti falta de alguns vigores antigos, mas os novos tambem sao daora.

Depois de terminar a dlc, a historia se mostra cada vez mais complexa e dificil de ser compreendia, a parte dois da dlc acredito que teve momentos muito chatos, mas vale muito a pena pela conclusao que traz.
Пройдено 4/5

This is a masterpiece! 
Everything is good, story, visuals, gameplay, wow)
Love the storyline

Words cannot explain how masterfully the story has been written. Nothing is what it seems but ... it's Bioshock 'Infinite'. The gameplay is fun and great, the story is quite literally mindblowing and the aesthetics of the game really leave an amazing impression in the player. You NEED to play and finish this game.

так, вчера я её прошёл и вот мои слова после игры "что я бл*ть сейчас прошёл.Для тех кто любит шутеры по типу колды советую ( по геймплею это колда но с магической  хернёй). Сюжет тут по началу банальный ноооооооооооооооооооооооооооооооооооооооо потом всё становится запутаным и кто не любит размышлять лучше не играйте в эту игру, ну впринципе всё ибо мне больше нечего рассказать об этой игре ( а ещё прокачивайте защиту если играете на высоком уровне сложности ;) )

+精练的剧情
+Elisabeth
+异能有意思
+地图设计少见
-敌人种类少
-战斗体验区别小，容易疲乏
-程序容易崩溃闪退

总的来说就是看个故事，人物和剧情都还挺有意思的，尤其是结局。10多个小时的体量也浪费不了多少时间，战斗也留不下特别深的印象，就当是看风景了。
I've only played like 10 mins and that game is so fuking good

Bioshock infinite is one of my favourite bioshock game ever with a amazing storyline, RPG mechanics, graphics and etc. overall the game is really awesome but the thing is that i didn't understand it's storyline which is really confusing for me.
